projects.description: This was my very first university project, developed in a team during the Web Technologies course. Our goal was to design and build a fully functional website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript — applying the fundamentals of web development in a real-world context. I was mainly responsible for the JavaScript implementation, as well as the logo and overall visual design of the site. Although I can now identify many areas I'd approach differently, I choose to include this project because it marks the starting point of my journey. It reflects my early understanding of core web technologies, and most importantly, shows how far I've come since then. After all, everyone starts somewhere.

projects.description: This individual project involved designing a personal webpage that showcased a portfolio. The theme was open-ended, allowing us to assume any profession we wanted. I chose a design that reflects a professional persona in filmmaking. The project was fully developed using Figma, leveraging its design and prototyping features to create interactive elements.

projects.description: This interdisciplinary project was developed during the second semester of my first year. Our objective was to create a gamified e-learning platform to help students learn JavaScript programming in a fun and engaging way. I was responsible for the entire visual design of the game, including the illustrations, UI composition, color palette, and typography, all crafted in Figma. I also contributed to the front-end development of the platform and implemented one of the game's interactive challenges — a memory game based on color sequences, designed to reinforce programming concepts through playful repetition. The platform featured elements such as leaderboards, a mascot, and interactive challenges to make the experience more dynamic. This project gave me valuable experience in combining education, visual storytelling, and interactivity, while collaborating in a multidisciplinary team.

images.alt: Homepage hero section with flight search functionality and Brazil map background
Complete landing page showing features, testimonials, and call-to-action sections
Dashboard interface displaying real-time flight data and interactive charts
Interactive map of Brazil with flight route pins and destination markers
User account settings page with profile customization options

projects.description: Developed in collaboration with a multidisciplinary team, this project involved building a dashboard to track live flights across Brazil. I was responsible for the entire visual design — including the landing page, color palette, typography, illustrations, and the design system in Figma. I also implemented the interactive map with pins and curated pop-up curiosities to enhance user engagement. Built with Vue.js, Vuetify, and Canvas, the platform combined real-time data with a user-friendly and visually rich interface.

Login interface with hand-drawn illustration and authentication choices
Home dashboard showing shared household products and usage statistics
User profile page displaying personal shared products and contribution history
Product detail view with consumption tracking and sharing options
Usage analytics screen showing product consumption patterns and debt calculations

projects.description: In this team project, we developed a mobile app to manage shared household resources through a virtual pantry. I was responsible for the entire design process, from wireflows and wireframes to UI/UX design, illustrations, and the front-end implementation — including the profile configuration system. The app allows users to add, track, and consume shared products, with automated debt calculation and notifications for restocking. The interface was designed in Figma, and the app was developed using Kotlin, with a strong focus on usability and collaboration.

projects.description: This was one of the most challenging and complete projects I've worked on. We created a mobile app to help young people build healthier eating habits through meal planning, guided cooking, and gamified motivation. I led the entire visual design, including the high-fidelity prototype, custom illustrations, animations, and front-end in React Native. We used tools like Figma, Protopie, After Effects, Firebase, MongoDB, and Node.js to build a rich, user-focused experience. You can see more about this project in my Behance.

projects.description: At E-goi, I worked on the creation of digital content for performance marketing and social media, including ad banners, AI-generated visuals, illustrations, and photo manipulation. I also conducted 5-second tests, A/B testing, and performance analysis on Instagram, along with KPI reviews and competitive research. This experience gave me insight into the challenge brands face to remain relevant in a fast-paced digital world — a lesson that shaped me both professionally and personally.

projects.title: Olá
projects.type: Aside Project that I worked on during my internship at E-goi

cover.alt: Summer campaign illustration featuring ice creams on beach with Heartbrand logo

images.alt: Beach scene illustration with various ice cream products and Heartbrand logo centerpiece
Website banner mockup for restaurant partners featuring summer ice cream campaign
Vertical banner design for Heartbrand summer campaign with 5 Summer Heroes products

Mobile-optimized horizontal banner design for summer campaign promotion

projects.description: During my internship at E-goi, I had the opportunity to collaborate on a summer campaign for Olá (Heartbrand), promoting their top-selling ice creams — the so-called '5 Summer Heroes.' I created the entire illustration by hand, following the Heartbrand's visual identity guidelines, and designed all versions of the campaign banners in Figma. These assets were adapted for desktop and mobile, and used across multiple channels: websites, emails, and digital ads aimed at restaurants and business partners. This project was a great opportunity to apply brand consistency within a commercial campaign, balancing creativity with clear marketing goals.
